title: Understanding the Population
text: The population refers to the entire group that the nutritionist is interested in studying. Think about who is directly involved in the school cafeteria lunches.

hintAnswer: All students eating lunch at the school cafeteria
title: Identifying the Population
text: Consider who the nutritionist wants to gather data from. Is it all students, just those who eat lunch, or another group?
choices: All students eating lunch at the school cafeteria
